model.duplicateServiceProviderNameValidation: The service provider name cannot be empty and can be up to thirty characters long
model.deleteConfirmation: Deleting may affect existing apps or KB. Confirm?
model.deleteModelConfirmation: Deleting may affect existing apps or Knowledge Base. Confirm?
model.modelNameTooltip: Name for local deployment or API request
model.sourceTracingModelTooltip: Auto-extract keywords for source tracing. Uses jieba if not configured.
model.documentSummaryModelTooltip: Summarizes content into title for vector DB. Not summarized if not configured.
model.qaSimilarModelTooltip: Generates similar questions for QA Knowledge Base.
model.assistantExecutionModeTooltip: Use function call mode if supported by model
model.assistantKnowledgeBaseMaxCharactersToolt: Max chars for model, truncate if exceeds
model.reorderAfterRetrievalTooltip: Whether to reorder the retrieved chunks, it is recommended to enable the single document Q & A scenario.

finetune.rtServiceTooltip: Select the RT service for the base model. The Finetune model will also be deployed here.
finetune.customSampleSizeTooltip2: If not selected, all samples from the chosen and preset datasets will be used.
finetune.customSampleSizeTooltip3: If selected, specify the sample count for each dataset. Leave blank or exceed the total sample count to use all samples.
finetune.parameterConfigurationTooltip: Refer to the product documentation for suggestions and reference data.
finetune.gpuDesc: GPU IDs for training, separated by commas, e.g., 0,1,2,3
finetune.valRatioDesc: Validation set ratio. If greater than 0, loss will be calculated after each epoch.
finetune.batchSizeDesc: Batch size for each training iteration. Larger sizes speed up training but use more memory.
finetune.learningRateDesc: Learning rate for updating weights. Too high slows convergence, too low slows training.
finetune.numEpochsDesc: Epochs control the number of iterations. Increase if the loss is still decreasing.
finetune.maxSeqLenDesc: Max sequence length (default 8192). Input + output length should not exceed this.
finetune.cpuLoadDesc: Load some parameters and optimizers to CPU to save GPU memory. Refer to documentation for details.
finetune.enterModelName: Model name must contain at least one letter and consist of numbers, letters, and underscores.
finetune.creator: Creator
finetune.formatTime: hh hours mm minutes ss seconds
finetune.confirmCancelPublish: This model is online. Confirm to cancel publishing?
finetune.confirmDeleteOnlineModel: Model is online. Confirm to delete {{name}}?
finetune.confirmDeletePublishedModel: Model is published. Confirm to delete {{name}}?
